REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0176 reute r f BC-KEYSTONE-CAMERA-<KYC> 03-11 0051

TEXT.TITLE: KEYSTONE CAMERA <KYC> TO DISTRIBUTE WATCHES
TEXT.BODY: Keystone Camera Products Corp said it has agreed to be the United States distribution manager for Le Clip clip-on fashion watches. Keystone said its agreement with <Le Clip S.A.> of Switzerland is effective through March 31, 1990. Reuter
